clip.quote: A photo and a little bit of text will never be able to compete with a video.
clip.why_clipworthy: This statement emphasizes the power of video over static images, which is a key insight for agents looking to enhance their marketing.
clip.suggested_hook: Why photos can't compete with videos in real estate marketing.

    "HOOK": "(0:00-0:08) Ever wonder why your listings aren't getting the attention they deserve? Here's the secret weapon you're missing!",
